website_summaries.verdict: One of the top all-around options from ECOVACS, thanks to its power and special features.
pros: Users can control where it goes via an app
cons: Some felt the vacuum is too big for the charging deck

customer_reviews.title: The mopping function is also great that It won't leave the floor so wet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Had been thinking to get a cleaning robot for a while, and I finally got this home. The major reason is the mopping function included. As a vacuum cleaner, it's incredibly quiet compare with the others which means I can use it whenever I want without bothering my neighbors. The mopping function is also great that It won't leave the floor so wet and slippery. It's simple and easy to use. You can also download an app and synchronize the robot and control it while you are not at home. The technology is really improving our days, saving me time on cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Ok for now
customer_reviews.text: Success with this bot is highly dependent on your home. My GF has an N79 and it seems to be able to navigate the step up from hardwood to carpet better than this one. It seems louder as well. Mine is getting stuck on the sloped base of my bar stools and on a welcome mat that has a vertical edge. It cleans but having to get up every 10 min to set it free is going to get tiresome. I haven't used the mop feature yet. I also can't get the remote to control it very well and the app controls when trying to left/right turn it lags a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Clean Up on isle 5
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old, which means, I have a cherrio spill every morning in my kitchen. I decided this type of devise would be perfect to follow my kid around cleaning up after her. This machine works pretty well, especially for the money. It doesn't have the mop feature, but I knew that when I bought it. It cleans up 90% of the items on the floor and doesn't seem to get lost. It can also handle my living room rug. The reason for four stars and not five- we have had to reset the timer several times, we can't figure out why it sometimes stops.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Laub

customer_reviews.title: Need to constantly reset the unit to connect
customer_reviews.text: About half the time I go to use the ecovac it the app cannot connect to the unit. I can see the ecovac on my network, but the app will not connect. So, one ever 2 weeks or so I have to do a full reset on the unit (losing all maps) and reconnect it to the network. This process takes 4-7 minutes of "searching" to find the ecovac on the network once you hit "add new vacuum" in the app. If I could, I would absolutely return this product. Cleans well, but is a connectivity nightmare. This was true of my prior ecovac. I should have learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste ur money!
customer_reviews.text: The water tank broke right away and it was leaking water. I contacted the manufacture for a replacement and they keep saying that I will receive it in 3-8 days and they never do process the order. They are lying non stop. I contacted Asurion, they want me to send the whooooole vacuum instead of just sending me a new water tank. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. It would be better to just throw away ur money to the trash or even burn ur $ than buy something from this trashy company. This is my second ECOVACS vacuum and the first and the second broke down on me in less than 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: MsLyds

customer_reviews.title: Works very well on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This is my second robotic vacuum. I bought this one because it wet mops the floors. It does a real good job and sweeping then wet mopping my kitchen, dining room and hall way floors. I like that it goes in a defined pattern, unlike my Shark ion which goes every which way. I do wish that it would have magnetic sensors like the Ion rather than having to block off rooms that have no doors. Ion does a better job on carpets but overall this is a great vacuum.mop set up.
customer_reviews.author: Dolls1206

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Navigation
customer_reviews.text: I had a N79 for about 2 years and it was awesome. It worked well until it finally failed after one of the drive gears inside broke. I got this robot on sale, and it has performed poorly compared to the N79. It simply does not avoid anything like the N79 did. It slams into walls full speed, and clearly does not work properly. If you check a couple other reviews, others complain of this and it looks to be a defect in this model. Due to this is covers much less area, and gets stuck frequently. Avoid this model, it is not worth the trouble. Get the N79 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good! I have to spot clean the floors in some places because it won’t get there. I really like it though. It can sometimes be frustrating to watch because you want it to do something differently, but it is a robot cleaning your floors and can’t see what you see. I’ll still take it over having to constantly sweep our hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Hamps5

customer_reviews.title: works great !!strongly recommend it !
customer_reviews.text: Uncle have two very messy toddlers, and this has been great for cleaning up after the kids spills something. They called it “super cleaning robotics ” The videos show how it works. Also does a pretty good job cleaning up hair, but I’d recommend it more for the mopping feature. Really helped me a lot! I’m thinking about have a dog. i believe deebot can works great too. maybe I don’t need to worry about dog hair any more :)))
customer_reviews.author: Doudoulong

customer_reviews.title: A nice machine to save your time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to clean the bedrooms and living room because I had a lot of dropped hairs. It is about 1000sq in total with hardwood floors. This machine works pretty well, especially for the money. The mopping feature works well too. It cleans up 90% of the items on the floor and doesn't seem to get lost. This machine is so handy and saves a lot of my cleaning time.
customer_reviews.author: Xin X.

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job of getting up the dust and pet hair
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent vacuum as robot vacs go. They dont have near the suction power of an upright but I didn't expect it to. It is a very good value for the money and does just as good a job as more expensive brands. I wich I had gotten the model that maps out the territory and follows the same pattern each time. I have to chase mine around to make sure it doesn't get caught up on chairs etc.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: We bought ECOVACS as it had both vacuum and mopping facility together. It stopped charging after 6 months.. we tried resetting, changing plug sites but nothing worked. We used to use mostly vacuum facility like twice a week. It died in 6 months. I will never recommend this product to anyone.When we emailed ECOVACS they did not even cared to respond to our email. Awful product and customer service. It also used to give us problem in connecting with Alexa.Please save your money and don’t invest in ECOVACS.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Chidirala

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not very good
customer_reviews.text: It cleans OK, but my complaints are: Takes 90 minutes to clean my 1000 sq/ft downstairs. The battery lasts about 90 minutes so when it was new, it barely would finish the cycle. Now a month later, it doesn't have enough charge to finish. Spends too much time along edges of furniture. Does not see chair/table legs, dishwasher, or refrigerator so it bumps into them at full speed. Sometimes hard enough to knock it off track and start going crooked. Keeps losing connection to app.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan ma

customer_reviews.title: Not Alexa compatible (yet)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but not (yet) compatible with Alexa as advertised. Promise for future per technical support / customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DGrander

customer_reviews.title: Missed most of the areas. Doesn’t recognize dark floor
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with customer care and they were responsive. I have dark laminate and tiles. The sensors failed to recognize dark floor. Customer care suggested to put a white tape on the floor to make it work, which is not practical for me every cleaning cycle. Also the app never worked for me. Otherwise i liked the fact that is low noise one. But i likemy old roomba better and will have to return this one. Another suggestion would be to include a virtual Wall because tha app doesn’t work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuyonline

customer_reviews.title: Vaccum is great but beware of the company and their app
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works great still have not updated to the new app which asks for a ton of unneeded permissions to operate and may be spyware. Makes me concerned I will not be able to use the vacuum at some without giving the company access to my location my contacts my phone user id etc.
customer_reviews.author: SLT

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used it for two weeks. It is really ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it for two weeks. It is really for peace of mind. Everyday my wife and I go to work, we turn it on and let it do the clean work on its own. We go back home with carpets vacuumed clean. It’s not only providing a healthier living environment, but also giving us an opportunity to lie down on couch and relax for the rest of day.
customer_reviews.author: Hedy Wei

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice
customer_reviews.text: Used once and it worked. Second time did not work. Tried called customer support. No response. Waiting on response.
customer_reviews.author: david ward

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Mop and different than ozmo 601 from another store.
customer_reviews.text: . This product just vacuums and even there is a mop attachment it doesn’t mop at all.. the water level stayed same after 2 hrs of mopping and the mop cloth was dry. No matter whatever setting I try it doesn’t mop. Finally ordered another ozmo 601 and received a totally different product than the one I received from my amazon order and guess what that mops. Save your money and buy elsewhere. I own another n79s deboot and it vacuums better than this one so Let’s me think I was duped and sent some another product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like first cheap robot not bad!
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. Battery life not 100 minutes, may be a round 50-60. Doesn't clean corners much, can't connect application for my phone with vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Su

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum didn’t work at all on area rugs, even ones with low pile (very flat). I put barriers so it would stay on the hard wood floor only and it worked ok. I’ve owned it for 6 months now and it doesn’t work at all anymore. It gives me an error message saying something is obstructing the rotating wheel, but nothing is there. Now I’m just trying to figure out how to return it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Motor Trouble
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the mop function. I'm returning mine today before the month runs out. Great at cleaning. not too intrusive and not too loud. I named it Deepot Chopra; the right wheel stopped putting out enough power for it to work on carpet. it stopped backing up too. works with alexa.
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy

customer_reviews.title: its a good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: i brought this robot couple month ago. the vacuum works good. it can continuously work around 2 hours after fully charging. but battery will be totally out within 2 days without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jatim

customer_reviews.title: Could not connect to iPhone even with help desk rep.
customer_reviews.text: We could not get the vacuum to work with our cellphones even after chatting with a person from the help desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Lets just say I’m having trouble setting it up with the app and the customer service rep told me he wasn’t able to help so he hung up the phone! Battery life is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great very happy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! We live on a small farm so we track dirt in all the time and it was a challenge keeping the hardwood floors clean. Now we just start this little robot up and it does its thing. We have a very unique floor plan so it does miss a few spots from time to time but I can't really blame the vacuum, and since we run this thing more often than most would it covers everything over time. Next time I would buy the one with the SmartNav only due to the complicated layout of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Deon Young

customer_reviews.title: Never finishes a cleaning cycle
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first time but then every time thereafter it will just stop somewhere in the middle of the room. It gets tangled in everything and does not do what I was looking for it to do. Don’t waste your money. On a side note I never leave bad reviews but this thing is not worth even $100.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lien

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year - buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fine for a little over a year but totally unexpectedly stopped taking charge and no matter how much I reset it, it doesn’t work. Eco ax’s Customer service isn’t being helpful either, saying the warranty expires after a year. It’s very disappointing to pay so much and have it not work after a year!
customer_reviews.author: A....B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little device!
customer_reviews.text: This little robot is a smart choice for anyone who hates vacuum cleaning. It moves well, can be programmed, covers the entire surface of home, goes under furniture and avoids obstacles well. It can also mop with water. It cleans 950 sq. feet in about an hour. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amra

customer_reviews.title: Good  cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t come with instructions of how to program it
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This lil lady actually does a bit better job than I expected. She absolutely has her hang ups, can't get her self back home to well and gets stuck on random things through out her cleaning tour, but overall I would recommend this to anyone. She doesn't do as good of a job as your standard vaccum, but she does a well enough job to justify her cost... And you don't have to vaccum.
customer_reviews.author: Justyn

customer_reviews.title: Dogs hate it - I love it
customer_reviews.text: It does amazing. He does get stuck at the same cent pretty often but it makes us laugh. Jack makes the kids and I happy and we love just watching him clean :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Van Wesenbeeck

customer_reviews.title: Good for in between vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: Works well on a daily basis. We have a lot of stuff in our living room, so sometimes the cleaner does not get back to the base. Have not tried the mop feature yet. The battery does not last as long as I would have thought. Usually only 30-40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: KellyH

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: When it worked well, it was excellent. But it’s been 6 or 7 weeks and it’s not charging properly and it’s too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: saidseven

customer_reviews.title: Leaking water
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all, left a lot of water behind
customer_reviews.author: Sabby

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: We bought this about 15 months ago. The battery is dead and they won’t sell us another battery, keep telling me to ship to a company for it to be repaired. I can’t find the battery anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda F M Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have another DEEBOT and love it but we really needed a mop too. This guy is amazing. I run it everyday and my floors look great. I do have to block some rug areas but other than that it’s totally amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Salvaged S.

customer_reviews.title: Great budget Vac-bot for small home
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job on short carpet and hardwoods, rarely makes it back to the charger, but does the entire downstairs ~800 sq. ft.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our yoga studio, so minimal dirt and no furniture, and it stopped working within months of purchase (but of course after the return window). We also could never get the mopping feature to work.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It bumps into the furniture quite often and doesn’t get all the places clean. It constantly thinks that it is done cleaning a room when big areas having even been reached.
customer_reviews.author: sandrachen

customer_reviews.title: Stuck a lot
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t mop as well as I would like. Gets stuck a lot throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !a
customer_reviews.text: my house is all hardwood floors and I have two very large messy Dogs...this thing it Great. It will run for 2 hrs on a charge and it mops the floors at the same time..LOVE IT !!
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: Some issues.
customer_reviews.text: It took us a while to figure out how to use the mop. It will not automatically return to the charging station. It does sweep well though which is the main reason we got it.
customer_reviews.author: MWEB

customer_reviews.title: Sensor does not work
customer_reviews.text: Have to give it a 1* because the anti-collision sensor is not working. Attached is the clip I took. If anyone in Ecovacs see this please contact me at elvistran281186@gmail.com , I need support because I'm in Vietnam, not in US.
customer_reviews.author: Tran Anh Quan

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Thge first 4 times I used it I was thrilled!!! then the plastic part the mop goes on would not stay attatched and then it just stopped moving! VERY FRUSTRATED
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: Battery life ok
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely but gets caught in the same places always.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye dust bunnies
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our place. It cleans underneath the beds and sofas well. And it works well with our Alexa too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Damie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My floors have never been so shiny for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Chaun Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I named him "D"
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. He works hard and does a great job. Light mopping and vacuuming but I run it everyday and it keeps the dust, dog hair, and bird feathers from scattering and piling up. Easy to program and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, great product, good to be a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my parents, and they love it a lot. It is so eassssssy to use, and good at cleaning hair(which is so hard to clean when we do not have the robot). Mopping selection is our favorite function, it makes us save a lot times. Usually my family mop once per week, but the robot can mop everyday to keep your home supper clean, especially good for anyone like me - do not like wear shoes at home. One of the most important point is it able to used oversea!!!! It’s able works under 110V or 220V!!!!! For me, it is worth the price and I will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona S

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it has trouble going from hardwood to carpet
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and does a fantastic job picking up dirt, just sometimes it has a little trouble going from hardwood to carpet
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gillaspy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this robot!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t go back to its base, gets lost and randomly starts working. Worse purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martin

customer_reviews.title: QUIT WORKING AFTER 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LIKED IT . IT JUST QUIT WORKING AFTER 6 MONTHS.
customer_reviews.author: luci

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase - the mop function is really good.
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: 6 month life.... not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June and it stopped working in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: RENATA M MAXTON

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Does a super great job on our floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it, it gets caught on everything my room a did not!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Degenford

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Over priced...keeps getting stuck in the same place over and over again...very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: Chad Ruoff

customer_reviews.title: which is very nice. Compared with Mi robot
customer_reviews.text: This Robot can not only mop but also clean the floor, which is very nice. Compared with Mi robot, it can not mop. Their prices are the similar. The battery life is 100 mins, long enough to cover two clean cycles. The noise control is very good and not annoying. I tried the Mi robot before, the noise is not pleasant. This one is much better. It include 4 different cleanning modes, gives you flexibility of building your own clean type.The Mi robot can only support one. The app is straightforward, easy to use. So far I am very satisfied with it. Good product and recommend it if you need mop and clean the floor simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Zhang Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Good robot vacuum... but mopping mode doesn't recognize carpets and area rugs...
customer_reviews.text: As a vacuum this is a great robot... but I bought this with the hope of letting it mop up my kitchen floor lightly on its own a bit during the week. Well this doesn't work so well as it doesn't recognize carpet or area rugs, so it drags the mop onto the rug, and then gets stuck because its mopping carpet not floor and that doesn't work. So mopping the kitchen automatically doesn't work so well... the mopping mode seems to work best when I use spot clean and baby sit the thing... its just disappointing that it can't automatically detect carpets and area rugs... seems like a flaw in the mopping algorithm to me.
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: excellent helper
customer_reviews.text: the best housework ever especially you have both carpet and wood floor. further more, I have a cat, and the cat hair is everywhere during summer. the vacuum works well in collecting those cat hair and cleaning up all the small piece that everywhere. I had a DEEBOT before which only has the sweeping function but also works really well for cat hair. With this new one which has mopping function, I don't worry about my floor anymore. and the battery last so long, it never run out of power for your usage every time. if that happens, it would go back "home" automatically and charge itself! so cute and useful!
customer_reviews.author: ChouChou Yu

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great addition to the cleaning arsenal! I have piano finish hardwood floors are was extremely hesitant as I was worried about this scratching my floors. BUT happy to report NOT ONE SCRATCH with this machine. I gave it a four-star as the mopping feature does not seem to work that well as it leaves streaks and uneven mopping. Perhaps if there were better pads associated with the mopping feature, this would correct the problem. Not sure but it would be worth investigating (thicker pads is a STRONG suggestion)! Other than that, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Mop *or* vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a mix of carpet and tile / hardwood, then ... don't bother. The device simply doesn't handle transitions between the two. In mop mode, it will venture into carpeted areas and immediately get stuck. In vacuum mode, it doesn't do much to areas without carpet. A very lazy and sloppy design job that tries to do too much without any real effort put into making it work well. Beyond that, there's almost no documentation included - have fun playing guessing games with your new toy. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Erik C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for mop and vac at the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve run it twice as vac only and it last 1:37 each time Now running with mop attached and it’s doing a great job. We’ve used the remote but the app is easy to install and use. The loss of the star is due to no virtual wall option so I’ve had to block my hardwood areas. Also it does great on area rugs but no fringe - that will get stuck. It also avoided the sunken living room perfectly. Happy with this unit and I do have a Roomba 671 to compare it with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little helper is better than my teenagers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little floor cleaner. I'm saddened to learn that it has been discontinued less than a year after I purchased it. I'm having a difficult time finding consumable parts and replacement parts for it. Customer service has been wonderful though. I'd buy another one, but so soon after I purchased this one as a gift for myself, I cannot afford it. *sad panda*
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I have the N7p model of this vacuum and absolutely love it so I bought this one with the mopping feature. The device stops in the middle of the floor for no reason. It does clean very well when it is running. It is also very loud at times. This is only my fourth time using it. It was not loud the first two times I used it. The longest run time it had was 20 minutes. I am contacting Ecovacs and will update if my review of this product changes.
customer_reviews.author: MrsH

customer_reviews.title: Not a "mop", much better models at this price range
customer_reviews.text: Ecovac (save company) makes a better product than this one, for the price. We have a Debot N97 and got this one as a second device bc of the mopping feature. "Mopping" is an overly generous them for what this does, and the functionality you lose bc of it makes this not worth it. This vacuum slams into things much more often than the N97 and seldom finds it's way back to the base without intervention. The dust bin is also much harder to empty without spilling dust/debris. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got my robot last week and it scared the crap out of my dog, which was great!!! Because it allowed me to clean areas where, in the past, my dog wouldn't let me. With my dog slightly terrified, it allowed me to upload videos of my dog's interactions with the robot online, which made me some small change on the side. So getting this robot was a great idea. Overall what you really need to know is that so far it has kept my floor clean (laminate flooring), which cut down my time on cleaning, it isn't too loud, and it is easy to operate-I mean it isn't hard to set it down and push a couple buttons.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 sessions
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked beautifully 3 times, and then it just stopped working. I tried cleaning every part, even pulling out the roller brush and cleaning around there. I charged it...I rebooted it several times...I pushed the reset button. Nothing. It lights up, beeps, then turns itself back off. Super disappointed. It cleaned much better than my previous robot vacuum. Had really high hopes for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lorah

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Hate it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this vacuum. I wish I could send it back. I have to literally follow it around my kitchen. It is not programable. It can't even find its way back to its home docking station. It will just go in a circle then turn off.
customer_reviews.author: PGsqrd

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy from this company again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a little over a year ago, and it worked fine. After having it plugged into the wall for a year, it stopped holding a charge. I am not sure what is wrong and can't get a hold of the company. You would do best buying a different robot.
customer_reviews.author: Stargirl Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans good, great value, just don’t count on the app
customer_reviews.text: The unit works wonderfully on my tile floor and rugs. It cleans well and I’m always surprised to see how much dust it picks up even when I use it regularly. The remote control is pretty self explanatory and very useful, but the app on my iPhone is pretty useless. It has never worked once.
customer_reviews.author: Aeren Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift and the mop/vacuum is working well ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the mop/vacuum is working well. Saving a lot of time, confusing to the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: annmk

customer_reviews.title: Toothless
customer_reviews.text: That's the name of our vacuum. He has a special place in our house. No need to go name brand!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This little bot is endearing and does a good job sweeping
customer_reviews.text: This little bot is endearing and does a good job sweeping! Haven't tried the mop feature yet. Will update when I do!
customer_reviews.author: M Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not great..bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months. Had to have replacement sent once the water stopped dispensing. Customer service is not very good non US based. Difficult to get problem fixed.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the battery does not charge anymore. The suction is not so great either.
customer_reviews.author: Evy B

customer_reviews.title: The best floor robot you will ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: this floor robot is awesome, it some how got out of our house and end up cleaning up our whole driveway LOL its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lee T.

customer_reviews.title: Buy one smarter
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I was babysitting the whole time using it. Spilled a little coffee dripping watched it go over at four times never did take it up
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!This cleaner was fantastic. Solid choice considering performance and price
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!This cleaner was fantastic. Solid choice considering performance and price. My mom was so excited before I tell her to give this cleaner to her as a gift. I did a lot of research before I ordered the Ozmo, Comparing Dyson, I still recommended this robot cleaner because you didn’t need hold it when you did housework. Dyson was much more expensive than Ozmo. This price is worth it. This robot will automatic detect barrier , and change direction to continue to work. (Video below) I still trying to firgure it out the mopping system, I may upload other video to show the work. Best cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eris

customer_reviews.title: I got this one because it was best rated for the economy options
customer_reviews.text: I have used it once. And that round was SOOOO excited..it got up pet hair, all over the house....which is why I have it. THEN I set it to go today and every time there is the 2 beeps for "main brush error". I have removed it, cleaned it, done all I know to do with it and still, three turns and 2 beep error. I got this one because it was best rated for the economy options. But looks like gonna have to go RHUMBA. So ranking a 1 until it starts working or I get the issue resolved/ returned.
customer_reviews.author: artallie

product_meta.title: ECOVACS OZMO 601 Self-Charging Robot Mop & Vacuum w/Smart Phone App Controls, Auto-Clean Mode, 2 Specialized Cleaning Modes, Digital Mop for Pet Hair, Dirt, Dried Liquids & Hard Floors
feature_bullets: Ecovacs Basic Features: Includes anti-drop & anti-collision sensors, ~120 minute battery life, auto-return charging, durable protective bumpers, air filtration, anti-scratch finish, a large easy-to-empty dustbin, large wheels for climbing thresholds, etc.

Advanced Smart Home & App Controls: Use Alexa & Google Home voice commands to start and stop cleanings. Use the Ecovacs Smart App controls to customize, schedule & track cleaning sessions, monitor accessory status & receive error alerts.
S-Shape Systematic Cleaning Path: Unlike most robot vacuum cleaners which follow a random path, this uses a systematic back-and-forth cleaning path when cleaning hard-surface floors.
OZMO Mopping: Electronic controlled mopping system controls water flow for an optimized mopping experience. Perfect for hard surface floors, dirt, dried liquids, etc.

1 Year Warranty, plus Accessories: Includes (1) charging station (1) remote control, (4) side brushes, (2) washable/ reusable microfiber cleaning clothes, (2) sponge & high efficiency air filters, (1) main brush & fantastic customer support. Note, we can not guarantee after-sales service to customers outside the United States.
